title: What are your craziest PESU conspiracy theories?
content:
One theory me and a few others have, and also somewhat subtly verified by some profs is that the 20 lab marks are not counted at all for final grade in 5 credit subject. These lab marks are never released on PESU app, and based on the marks in review too, grade seems to be based on internals + ESA marks(people with different lab marks noticing that their final grade is not affected by it). I'm not 100% certain about this but I think there is a high chance.

Any other conspiracies y'all are aware of? Need not be related to academics.

comments.body: lab marks are added thats for sure , i got a c in physics last sem , despite getting like 31/50 in isa+assignment and like 42 in esa
The hospital is a front for organ trafficking
31+42 is 73 right >70 is b grade right???

Hmm it's possible that's because of moderation in marks vs grade. It's not impossible because I've got S in a subject where I got like 70s (out of 100 ISA + ESA) because everyone did horrible in that lol.

But yeah maybe it is counted, I'm mostly just speculating.
PESSAT is a huge scam and they definitely do rank manipulation.

PESSAT is prolly one of the least manipulated exams in India, They have a very legitimate counselling process too. Idk a single person who claimed their performance was unexpected in the Exam, unlike for VITEE or Comedk.   
U have to give credit where credit is due, Passat is legit. If they rly wanted to do rank manipulation they would have never switched to JEE, as the ranks are not in their control now.
hello jawahar nice to meet you

Ik about the mortuary, idk about graveyard
i got 42/100 dude , that wud be 31+21=52
Ohh I thought u got 42 for 50
PES construction never ends cause of a superstition that something terrible will happen if they conclude the construction

It is definitely counted into your assessment marks. I did all my assignments well, everything to perfection, but messed up my lab exam terribly (submitted a blank paper, didnt conduct the experiment at all. Did my viva fine though). Everyone in my class got either a 9 or a 10 in their assessment.. I ended up with a 6 or 7. Grinded my ass for my isas esas lol ended up with a B.  
So ye,  
tldr: they definitely do get counted
Doreswamy encroached the lake and built PES college there. It's not a conspiracy, it's a fact.
its true I did
hi saar big fan
Actually tho pessat is pretty legit all my friends got ranks somewhat according to thier jee ranks too so yeah it seems legit
